notes: Vivion is a wholesale ingredient provider specializing in bulk inulin supply for cosmetic and other applications. They focus on delivering consistent purity and outstanding quality with reliable supply chain capabilities. As a bulk supplier, Vivion offers competitive wholesale pricing for large volume orders, making them ideal for established brands and manufacturers. Their quality certifications ensure consistent product standards. Inulin serves as a natural prebiotic in skincare formulations, supporting microbiome health and balance. Suitable for brands requiring reliable, large-scale ingredient supply.
